topHeader.announcement: Explore our escape rooms and live an adventure where every detail matters. Find codes, solve riddles, and prove your wit... Ready to escape?

hero.badge: The best escape room experience in Tunja
hero.description: Immerse yourself in a world of puzzles, mysteries and teamwork. Do you have what it takes to escape in 60 minutes?

guidelines.title: Things you must know
guidelines.subtitle: Before entering any of our rooms, it's important to know these basic rules.

rules.title: There is a minimum age per room
lines: Kids 9+ can enter with an adult

rules.title: If you have claustrophobia or heart conditions
lines: You enter at your own risk.

rules.title: Do not distract or ignore
lines: the Game Master; they are there to help you

rules.title: Wear comfortable clothes
lines: and be ready to move and crouch

fact.label: Fun fact:
fact.copy: Average time to find the first clue is 6 to 7 minutes. The first 120 seconds play a key role.

guidelines.cta: Only the brave uncover the mystery

lead.primary: Step into a world where every detail is a clue and every second counts. Discover unique challenges and puzzles that put your mind to the test.
lead.secondary: Gather your crew, spark your curiosity, and let the journey pull you in.

rooms.loadError: We couldn't load the rooms. Showing our favorites.
rooms.comingSoonCopy: A new mission is under construction, ready to test you.

fallback.portal: Jump across worlds, solve puzzles and beat the clock.
fallback.canibal: Stay silent, stay sharp, and escape with your nerves intact.
fallback.manicomio: A psychological escape where every detail matters.

opinions.title: What our players say
opinions.lead: Real stories from teams who already lived the Logic experience.

lead: The larger the group, the lower the cost per person.
Prices vary depending on whether you come on weekdays or weekends.

highlight.title: An epic experience
highlight.subtitle: Rates designed for every team size.

pricing.error: We could not load the rates. Showing reference values.

app.sectionsPlaceholder: The following sections will go here

sections.title: WHO WE ARE
sections.body: At Logic Escape Room we are creators of hidden worlds, stories you live up close, and challenges that awaken your wit. We were born to turn a simple game into a memorable experience: detailed environments, clever puzzles, and an atmosphere where nothing is what it seems.

sections.title: WHAT WE DO
sections.body: At Logic we design and operate immersive escape experiences where groups of friends, families, couples, or teams must solve riddles, find clues, and complete missions before time runs out. We build original themed rooms, craft unique puzzles, and create environments that blend technology, narrative, and gameplay. Our goal is to give you an intense, exciting, and different adventure.

footer.note: Write to us and book your adventure

cafeteria.title: Cafeteria Menu
cafeteria.subtitle: Recharge before or after your mission. Freshly made options for your team.

page.subtitle: Complete the process in 4 steps: selection, details, summary, and payment.

overlays.stepConfirmed: This step has already been confirmed
overlays.createReservation: Create the reservation in step 3 to continue

selection.subtitle: Choose the experience, how many people are coming, and an available time slot.
selection.pickDateHint: Select a date to see available rooms and time slots.
selection.cantFindSlotPrefix: If you can't find availability for the day or time you want,
selection.cantFindSlotSuffix: and we'll help you find another option.
selection.selectRoomToEnable: Select a room to enable the selector.

details.subtitle: Tell us who's booking and how we can contact you.

email.label: Email
email.tooltip: We'll use your email to send your booking confirmation and invite you to the event in Google Calendar.

phone.helper: We'll use this number to message you on WhatsApp if needed.

firstTime.question: Is this your first time at Logic Escape Room?
firstTime.aria: First time at Logic Escape Room

validation.phoneDigitsOnly: Phone number must contain only digits.
validation.firstTimeRequired: Select yes or no to continue.

summary.subtitle: Review the details and press Reserve to secure your spot.

duration.tooltip: The experience lasts 90 minutes in total, including the briefing, time inside the room, and the photo session.

deposit.tooltip: The deposit is paid after you reserve your spot. Clicking Reserve will show detailed instructions.

errors.createFailed: We couldn't create the booking. Please try again.

payment.subtitle: Booking created. Pay the deposit and send the receipt via WhatsApp.
payment.depositPrefix: To confirm your booking, pay a deposit of
payment.payHint: You can pay by scanning the QR or using the Bre-B key:
payment.consultCodeHint: Save this code to check the status of your booking.

qrDialog.title: Bre-B payment QR
qrDialog.fallbackKey: If you prefer, you can also pay using the key: {{key}}.

payment.whatsappPrefill: Hello! I'm sending the payment receipt for the deposit under the name {{name}} for {{date}} at {{time}}.

status.subtitle: Enter your consultation code to see the booking status.
status.meta: The code is generated at the end of the payment step.
status.resultEmpty: No lookup has been made yet. Enter a code to see the status here.

registered.title: Registered
registered.desc: Booking created and awaiting deposit payment.

errors.requiredCode: Enter a consultation code to continue.
errors.notFound: We couldn't find a booking with that code.
errors.unknown: We couldn't check the status. Please try again.

login.subtitle: Sign in to manage bookings and system settings.
